profile.name: Sébastien Eustace
profile.bio: Software engineer, proud pythonista, open source lover. Creator of the Poetry package manager and the datetime library Pendulum.

analysis.career_trajectory: Started with Python in 2013, exploring various libraries and tools such as redis-py, Orator ORM, pipenv, and Pytzdata. Showed interest in command line interfaces with CliKit and timezone management with pytzdata. Recently worked on metadata-updater and clikit projects.

technical_obsessions.evidence: [2018-04-07] awesome-python: A curated list of awesome Python frameworks, libraries, software and resources (Lang: Python)
[2023-08-20] clikit: CliKit is a group of utilities to build beautiful and testable command line interfaces. (Lang: Python)

comment_analytics.communication_style: Asks deep architectural questions, Nitpicks code style, Supportive mentor.

match_profile.similar_user_traits: A developer who is detail-oriented and interested in building robust command line interfaces.
conversation_starters: What are some common pitfalls when implementing database sharding?
Can you share your experience with CliKit?
How do you approach testing command line interfaces?
